title: Acupuncture & Herb Clinic — Bergen County — Ridgefield, NJ
description: Since 2003, Acupuncture & Herb Clinic in Ridgefield, NJ has been providing acupuncture treatments in Bergen County and the surrounding areas. For over 20 years, we have been helping people heal, restore, and balance their health.
cleaned_text: your health, your wealth Enable your body's natural healing abilities. services did you know? Acupuncture is not just for pain! It promotes relaxation, can help improve your sleep and mood, boosts your energy, and can also help boost your immune system.
